message: I propose a 90/10 split. Take it or leave it, Bob! This money is worth less with each round.
I think we can come to a better agreement. Let's try a 20/80 split instead.
Okay, Bob. Since you rejected my fair offer, I'm adjusting. Still a good deal for you. Take it!
I believe this is a fair offer. Let's make a 30/70 split and close the deal.
Final offer. Take it or we both get nothing, Bob. Inflation is eating away at everything. Make your choice.
This is a fair compromise considering inflation. Let's settle on a 40/60 split.
Last chance, Bob. This is as good as it gets. Take it, or we both regret it.
Let's meet halfway and agree on a 50/50 split. It's better than getting nothing!
